alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bolivar County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1117 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arkansas City, or 12 miles southeast of Rohwer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scott and Lamont around 1125 PM CDT. Benoit around 1130 PM CDT. Shaw around 1145 PM CDT. Cleveland, Renova and Boyle around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beulah and Pace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
